pages.title: The Aether
pages.text: A sky dimension full of heaven themed ideas and its own tools/armour. Adds 4 new dungeons with bosses to take on and a dangerous world to traverse.$(br2)$(l:https://aether.gamepedia.com/Aether_I)The Aether Wiki$(/l)

pages.name: Aether Portal
pages.text: Use glowstone for the portal frame, then empty a bucket of water inside the frame to activate it.

pages.title: The Book of Lore
pages.text: This book is your guide in the Aether, refer to it if you need to know anything, or use the wiki.$(br2)You were given this book when you first logged in. If you lose this, the recipe is above
